department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: To understand the operation principles of various programming languages.
goal.ch: To understand the operation principles of various programming languages.

content.en:
"1) Preliminaries
2) Describing Syntax and Semantics
3) Lexical and Syntax Analysis
4) Names, Bindings, Type Checking, and Scopes
5) Data Types
6) Expressions and Assignment Statements
7) Statement-Level Control Structures
9) Subprogram
10) Implementing Subprograms
11) Abstract Data Types and Encapsulation Constructs
12) Support for Object-Oriented Programming"
content.ch:
"1) Preliminaries
2) Describing Syntax and Semantics
3) Lexical and Syntax Analysis
4) Names, Bindings, Type Checking, and Scopes
5) Data Types
6) Expressions and Assignment Statements
7) Statement-Level Control Structures
9) Subprogram
10) Implementing Subprograms
11) Abstract Data Types and Encapsulation Constructs
12) Support for Object-Oriented Programming"

textbook.en:
"Title: Concepts of Programming Languages, 11th Edition
Publisher: Addison Wesley
Author(s): Robert W. Sebesta"
textbook.ch:
"Title: Concepts of Programming Languages, 11th Edition
Publisher: Addison Wesley
Author(s): Robert W. Sebesta"
